mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE post_id=#{postId} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(post_title,post_content,user_id,category_id,status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{postTitle}, #{postContent},#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, user_id = #{userId}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status = #{status}, updated_at = now() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
